p: The antioxidant activity of the essential oils was estimated using the DPPH [ 35] and the Î²-carotene-linoleic acid methods [ 35]. Positive control (BHT) and negative control were treated as samples and a calibration curve was obtained. The amount of the samples that inhibited 50% of each antioxidant solution (IC 50) were considered as the antioxidant activities and experiments were repeated twice.
